questions.question: This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to rescue Sanji from a political marriage, involving a battle against the Big Mom Pirates. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' separation and subsequent two-year hiatus, as well as the introduction of the Eleven Supernovas. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This character, introduced in the Dressrosa arc, possesses the power of the Hobby-Hobby Fruit and can turn people into toys. Who is...?
This character, known for their control over ice and introduction in the Whole Cake Island arc, is one of the three Sweet Commanders of the Big Mom Pirates. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
